channel.title: Run a RSPS on mac - Help please
channel.description:
Hello guys,
Sorry for asking this again, but it will be a little different this time. I wondered how to run a RSP on mac. Many tutorials have been made about how to run a 317 RSPS ( often delta ), but I haven't found one one the web telling me [u]how to run a 317 + ( 600 + is possible ) RSPS on mac[/u]. I tried it myself, but I often get many errors, and I wondered if any of you knew how to make a good 600 + RSPS on mac.
Thanks for your time, :)
Devastor

item.title: Run a RSPS on mac - Help please
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Devastor, post:11, topic:521880”]Well, i tried IDE, but I have o idea how to use it.
I tried to look for some guides on te web, but didn’t find any that explain step by step.

Does any1 know a good guide?

Thanks in advance,

Devastor[/quote]
What are you stuck on?

Read full topic
